mapper.insert: insert into register (NID, userID, phoneNumber, password) values (#{NID}, #{userID}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password})
mapper.select: select password from register where NID = #{NID}
select userID, phoneNumber from register where NID = #{NID}
mapper.insert: insert into keyinfo (addrGenIP, ideakey, timeinfo) values (#{addrGenIP}, #{ideaKey}, #{timeInfo})
mapper.select: select ideakey, timeinfo from keyinfo where addrGenIP = #{addrGenIP} order by timeinfo desc
select prefix from aidinfo where aid = #{AID}
